scenario_text.value:
(Following directions from Agumon and the
others, we emerge onto a mountain path.)

Hard to believe this place was right here, so
close to the school.

Yeah, it’s just a little to the left of the
shrine, and yet it feels so different.

(We’re a big group, and Haru’s a little kid,
but we still made it in under an hour...)

How is there a mountain range so close to
this hill and the school? It makes no sense.

This drop goes really far down. It’s not too
steep, but it would still be a nasty fall.
Man, this is freaky...
Hey, look! There’s a huge bridge over there!

Wow, that’s enormous! I’ve never seen
anything like it before!
Not this again. Can’t you give it a rest?
Ooh, what do you mean? Give what a rest?

Agumon keeps talking about how he wants to be
like all this stuff he sees.

Yup. I wanna be super big, just like that
bridge!
You see what I mean?
Haha, that’s pretty cute of you, Agumon.

Wait! How did you know it was a “bridge” when
you’ve never seen one before?!
Huh? Well... Actually, I’m not sure.
You guys are funny like that.
Don’t you think it’s weird, Takuma?

Yeah, though it’s hardly the only strange
thing about them.

You got me there! The fact that they even
exist is pretty strange.
Heh heh, you’re too kind...
That wasn’t a compliment!

I’ve been having so much fun with Floramon
and the others that it’s easy to forget,

but we still don’t really have any idea what
they are.

(Yeah. That’s the kind of question I wish the
professor were here to answer.)
(Not that I can say that in front of Saki.)
You all right, Ryo?

*mumble* *mumble* Shut up... Why me? Damn
it...

If... If we get attacked here... This time...
This time I’m d-d-d...

It’s okay! I don’t sense anything dangerous
nearby.
Wah! Shut up! Leave me alone!
Why does everyone... Arrgh...

Seriously, Ryo, are you all right? Try not to
push yourself any more than you have to.
Kew...
Shut up! Mind your own damn business.

Like you even care what happens to me... Just
go on and leave me alone!

That’s not going to happen! We’re not leaving
anyone behind.

That’s what the professor wanted, so I...
I owe that to him, too.
Yeah, I feel the same way.
We’re not about to just leave you alone.

(I don’t want to lose another person the way
we lost the professor...)
Damn it... Just shut up...

(And now he’s back to mumbling under his
breath again.)

(At least he’s keeping pace. Hopefully that’s
a good sign.)

We’ve covered quite the distance. The tower’s
on top of this mountain, right?
It sure is!

Hm? Look! There’s someone over there!
Is that...
It’s Kaito!
It is?!
Oh, what a relief! I’m so glad he’s okay!

Hm? Wait... There’s someone with him. Who
could that be?
You! What did you do with Miu?!

And you’d better give me a straight answer,
or you’re not gonna like what happens next!

*sigh*... When will you get it through your
skull that I don’t have to tell you anything?
Why, you little—! Fine, you asked for this!
Kaito!
Hm?
Huh?

Kaito! You’re all right! It’s so good to see
you!
Guys, help me out! This lady—
Help! Please!
Huh...?

This boy came out of nowhere and started
screaming at me! I don’t know why!

Stop lying, I know you’re a monster in
disguise!
Kaito, stop! What’s going on?
